score.pbp: Sandy Leon grounds into a force out, third baseman Brandon Snyder to second baseman Bryan Mejia. Tzu-Wei Lin scores. Deiner Lopez out at 2nd. Sandy Leon advances to 2nd, on a throwing error by second baseman Bryan Mejia.

score.pbp: Chris Young reaches on a force attempt, missed catch error by second baseman Bryan Mejia, assist to third baseman Brandon Snyder. Mike Miller scores. Matt Dominguez to 2nd.
